GP12vd3343pu:2: stutena darśayām āsa viśvarūpaṃ dvijanmanām // Vdha_3,343.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:3: prasādaṃ paramaṃ tasya brūhi bhaktajane mama /
GP12vd3343pu:4: tṛptiṃ brahman na gacchāmi śṛṇvann etat kathāmṛtam // Vdha_3,343.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:7: tasyāsti sadṛśī kanyā guṇakāśīti viśrutā // Vdha_3,343.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:8: mātalir nāradaś caiva anveṣṭuṃ tad vanaṃ (?) purā /
GP12vd3343pu:10: sumukhākhyaṃ dadṛśatus tau gṛhītvā gatāv ubhau /
GP12vd3343pu:11: nāge śakraṃ tataḥ śakrād ayācetāṃ tu tāv ubhau // Vdha_3,343.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:12: sumukhasyābhayaṃ tārkṣyāt tayoḥ śakro dadau varam /
GP12vd3343pu:13: vīryajñas tārkṣyavīryasya sa yayau keśavāntikam // Vdha_3,343.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:15: ājagāma tatas tārkṣyaḥ saroṣaḥ keśavāntikam // Vdha_3,343.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:17: kim avajñāya māṃ kṛṣṇa sumukhe dīyate varaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:18: mama pṛṣṭhagataḥ śatruṃs tvaṃ nihaṃsi ca buddhyase /
GP12vd3343pu:19: kuṭumbābharaṇaṃ śatruṃ pannagaṃ mama rakṣasi // Vdha_3,343.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:21: evam uktas tadā tena viṣṇur garuḍam abravīt // Vdha_3,343.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:23: na me śakto jagad voḍhuṃ sakalaṃ vihageśvara /
GP12vd3343pu:25: śaktiś ced asti voḍhuṃ te bhujam ekaṃ vahasva me /
GP12vd3343pu:26: evam uktvā dadau pṛṣṭhe tasya savyaṃ bhujaṃ hariḥ // Vdha_3,343.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:28: klānto dīnaś ca tuṣṭāva deveśaṃ madhusūdanam // Vdha_3,343.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:33: tvam eva deva trailokyaṃ sadā dhārayase 'nagha // Vdha_3,343.14 //
GP12vd3343pu:34: ātmānam ātmanā deva tvam eva vahase sadā /
GP12vd3343pu:35: yasya te deva sakalaṃ dehe tribhuvanaṃ sthitam // Vdha_3,343.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:36: tasya voḍhuṃ kathaṃ śaktā madvidhā hi sahasraśaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:37: tasmāt prasīda bhagavan mama dhvajanivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:38: nāsty antas tava deveśa karmaṇāṃ bhuvanatraye /
GP12vd3343pu:39: kas te kīrtayituṃ śaktaḥ karmāṇy anavaśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,343.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:40: karmaṇāṃ kīrtanaṃ vā te kā stutiḥ parameśvara /
GP12vd3343pu:41: sarvatra sarvaśaktis tvaṃ prasīda mama śatruhan // Vdha_3,343.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:45: prasīda me namas te 'stu pakṣiṇo dhvajavāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:47: ātmasaṃbhāvanā tārkṣya na kāryā te kadācana /
GP12vd3343pu:48: aham evātmanātmānaṃ vahāmi tvāṃ ca dhāraye // Vdha_3,343.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:49: prītā na ca tvayā bhāryā yad apakṣaḥ kṛto hy asi /
GP12vd3343pu:50: mayā tribhuvanaṃ nyastaṃ tvadartham akhilaṃ bhuje // Vdha_3,343.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:51: tvayā tulyo hi balavāṃl loke 'nyo nāsti kaścana /
GP12vd3343pu:52: yasya dordaṇḍasaṃsparśāj jīvitaṃ na ca nirgatam // Vdha_3,343.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:54: viśeṣavantaḥ pakṣānte bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // Vdha_3,343.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:56: evam uktaḥ suparṇas tu suparṇān prāptavān punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:58: evaṃ puruṣavat tārkṣyaḥ stūyamānaś ca śārṅgiṇam /
GP12vd3343pu:62: tasmād rājan vijānīhi tasya dānavavidviṣaḥ // Vdha_3,343.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:63: nāsty adeyaṃ hi bhakteṣu devarājyam api dhruvam /
GP12vd3343pu:66: smṛtamātraḥ sa deveśas tadbhayād vinivartakaḥ // Vdha_3,343.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:68: khagapanṛpatiyāyī vīrasaṃjātavarṇo bhavatu madhuripus te bhaktinamrasya tuṣṭaḥ // Vdha_3,343.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:69: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde sumukhopākhyānavarṇano nāma
GP12vd3343pu:72: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ prasādaṃ paramaṃ hi yat /
GP12vd3343pu:73: kṛtaṃ bhaktajane tena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // Vdha_3,344.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:75: hate tribhuvane rājañ śakrasya balinā purā /
GP12vd3343pu:76: jagāma śakraḥ śaraṇaṃ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ tataḥ // Vdha_3,344.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:78: tam āha varado brahmā gaccha kaśyapa keśavam // Vdha_3,344.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:80: taṃ ca prārthaya putratve sa te putro bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,344.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:81: tataḥ sa sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ devarājasya dāsyati /
GP12vd3343pu:82: evaṃ coktaḥ kaśyapas tu sārdhaṃ tridaśapuṅgavaiḥ // Vdha_3,344.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:83: kṣīrābdhiṃ sa tato gatvā dadarśa tapasā harim /
GP12vd3343pu:84: dṛṣṭvā stavena tuṣṭāva tatas tasya tadā hariḥ // Vdha_3,344.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:86: tribhir natais tribhuvanaṃ sarvam ākramya viśvadhṛk // Vdha_3,344.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:87: prādāc chakrāya rājendra baddhvā daityeśvaraṃ balim /
GP12vd3343pu:88: kaśyapena stutas tv evaṃ tasya putratvam āgataḥ // Vdha_3,344.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:91: taṃ stavaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva sarvapāpaharaṃ śivam // Vdha_3,344.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:93: śṛṇu rājan stavaṃ puṇyaṃ kaśyapena prakīrtitam /
GP12vd3343pu:163: svāhā makheṣu bhāgaprāśinaṃ śatadhāraṃ sahasradhāraṃ ca
GP12vd3343pu:164: bhūr vā bhuvar vā tvam eva
GP12vd3343pu:212: viśvabhuk tvam eva bhuvikrama atibhūḥ prabhākara śambhuḥ bh[u]vaḥsvayaṃbhū
GP12vd3343pu:231: stotreṇa yaḥ kāśyapanirmitena stotraṃ sadā devavarasya kartā /
GP12vd3343pu:232: kālyaṃ śucis tadgatamānasena gantā sa lokān puruṣottamasya // Vdha_3,344.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:233: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde kaśyapastotravarṇano nāma catuś
GP12vd3343pu:237: brūhi bhaktajane mahyaṃ devadevasya cakriṇaḥ // Vdha_3,345.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:238: na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ tasya śṛṇvānaḥ śravaṇāmṛtam /
GP12vd3343pu:239: hastatrāṇaprado loke ya ekaḥ patatāṃ nṛṇām // Vdha_3,345.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:241: devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva vivadantaḥ purānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:242: bījair yaṣṭavyam ity etat trivarṣaparamoṣitaiḥ // Vdha_3,345.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:244: pakṣo 'yam āsīd dharmajña ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām // Vdha_3,345.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:245: devānāṃ tu paśuḥ pakṣas tato mārgāgato [']bhavat /
GP12vd3343pu:246: rājoparicaro nāma vasur vasumatāṃ varaḥ // Vdha_3,345.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:247: devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva papṛcchantas tadā vasum /
GP12vd3343pu:248: yathopanītair yaṣṭavyam ity uktaṃ vasunā purā // Vdha_3,345.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:252: nidhanārthaṃ matiṃ cakrur devabhaktasya dānavāḥ // Vdha_3,345.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:254: nyavedayaṃs tathā cakraṃ devācārye bṛhaspatau // Vdha_3,345.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:255: bṛhaspatis tato gatvā bhūmer vivaragaṃ nṛpam /
GP12vd3343pu:256: rakṣām adhyāpayām āsa vaiṣṇavīm aparājitām // Vdha_3,345.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:259: adhyāpya taṃ ca rājānam idam āha bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,345.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:261: ihastho bhokṣyase rājan vasor dhārāṃ hutāṃ dvijaiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:262: devatānāṃ prasādena tayā cāpyāyitaḥ sadā // Vdha_3,345.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:263: vidyayā cānayā rājann avadhyas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi /
GP12vd3343pu:265: evam uktvā sa rājānaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata // Vdha_3,345.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:267: rakṣāṃ tu tāṃ me kathaya dvijendra kṛtā tu yā devapurohitena /
GP12vd3343pu:268: rājño vasor bhūmibilasthitasya rakṣā hi sāgryā paramā matā me // Vdha_3,345.14 //
GP12vd3343pu:269: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde bhūvivarasthitarājño rakṣāvarṇano nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 3.345 //
GP12vd3343pu:271: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya / Vdha_3,346.0.[1] / namo
GP12vd3343pu:292: namo 'stu te namo 'stu te namo 'stu te / Vdha_3,346.0.[22] /
GP12vd3343pu:339: ya imām aparājitāṃ paramavaiṣṇavīṃ siddhāṃ mahāvidyāṃ japati paṭati śṛṇoti smarati dhārayati
GP12vd3343pu:347: etair mantrair udāhṛtaiḥ siddhaiḥ saṃsiddhapūjitaiḥ / tad yathā
GP12vd3343pu:381: sthalagataṃ jalagatam antarikṣagataṃ vā rakṣa rakṣa sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā / Vdha_3,346.0.[90] /
GP12vd3343pu:382: yasyāḥ praṇaśyate puṣpaṃ garbho vā patate yadi /
GP12vd3343pu:383: mriyante bālakā yasyāḥ kākavandhyā ca yā bhavet // Vdha_3,346.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:384: śastraṃ dhārayate hy eṣāṃ samare kāṇḍadāruṇi /
GP12vd3343pu:398: nāśaya vā saṃhara duḥsvapnaṃ vināśaya / Vdha_3,346.2.[1] /
GP12vd3343pu:419: yeṣāṃ dviṣanti pratyakṣaṃ paro[']kṣaṃ vā sarvān
GP12vd3343pu:442: sarvabhūteṣu māṃ priyaṃ kuru kuru / Vdha_3,346.2.[37] /
GP12vd3343pu:463: yathāmanīṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tan mama sidhyatu svāhā / Vdha_3,346.2.[58] /
GP12vd3343pu:469: yatraivāgataṃ pāpaṃ tatraiva pratigacchatu svāhā / Vdha_3,346.2.[64] / oṃ
GP12vd3343pu:474: amoghāṃ paṭhitasiddhāṃ vaiṣṇavīm aparājitāṃ dhyāyet / Vdha_3,346.2.[69] /
GP12vd3343pu:480: āgamya vāgbhir ugrābhis tarjayantaś ca te vasum /
GP12vd3343pu:481: nirjaghnur āyudhair bhīmair devapakṣaparaṃ sadā // Vdha_3,346.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:482: na ca te 'sya rujaṃ cakrur na ca tān apy udīkṣitā /
GP12vd3343pu:483: cintayām āsa deveśaṃ manasā madhusūdanam // Vdha_3,346.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:484: tato niṣphalayatnās te dṛṣṭvā tan mahad adbhutam /
GP12vd3343pu:485: jagmuḥ sarve gṛhān eva vilakṣā daityadānavāḥ // Vdha_3,346.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:488: gatvā garuḍa rājānam vasuṃ śīghram ihānaya // Vdha_3,346.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:489: evam uktaḥ sa garuḍo devadevena cakriṇā /
GP12vd3343pu:495: tuṣṭāva garuḍaṃ vāgbhir arthyābhir amitakriyaḥ // Vdha_3,346.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:502: gajakacchapatāṃ prāptau tāv ubhau vairasaṃyutau // Vdha_3,346.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:505: nakhasthau tau tvayā nītau hatau bhuktau ca pakṣipa /
GP12vd3343pu:511: śākhā bhinnāḥ sthitā yatra vālakhilyāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,346.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:512: tāṃs tu vaktragatān kṛtvā nakhasthair gajakacchapaiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:513: nabhasy eva nirālambe sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ // Vdha_3,346.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:514: tvayā jitvā raṇe sarvān devāñ śakrapurogamān /
GP12vd3343pu:515: āhṛtaṃ tu paraṃ somaṃ vahner vāpy atha kāśyapa // Vdha_3,346.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:516: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā bhuvi cakṣuṣoḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:517: jihvāgranityagaṃ bhuñjañ cakre tau devanirmitau // Vdha_3,346.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:518: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītam eva na bhakṣitam /
GP12vd3343pu:519: tena viṣṇor dhvajasthāne vāhanatvaṃ gato hy asi // Vdha_3,346.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:520: tvayā nikṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāś ca vañcitāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:521: jahāra sahasā yatra tac chīghraṃ balasūdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:522: yatra jihvā dvidhā bhūtā pannagānāṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:523: vinatā mocitā dāsyāt kaṭvā pūrvaṃ jitā paṇe // Vdha_3,346.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:524: uccaiḥśravās tu kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ity eva bhāṣatī /
GP12vd3343pu:525: kṛṣṇavālam ahaṃ manye pucchaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva vākchalāt // Vdha_3,346.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:528: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadā nāntaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12vd3343pu:529: tadā tava suparṇeti nāma khyātaṃ jagattraye // Vdha_3,346.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:530: tejasā bhāskaraṃ devaṃ javena ca samīraṇam /
GP12vd3343pu:531: na te tulyo mahābhāga nāgapakṣakṣayaṃkara // Vdha_3,346.26 //
GP12vd3343pu:533: kṣipraṃ praṇāśam āyāti tathā sarvabhayāni ca // Vdha_3,346.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:534: svakayā pakṣanāḍyā tvaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ vahan /
GP12vd3343pu:535: nopayāsi prabho khedaṃ yathā devo janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:536: tvam ṛṣis tvaṃ mahābhāgas tvaṃ devaḥ patageśvaraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:537: tvaṃ prabhus tapanaprakhyas tvaṃ nas trāṇam anuttamam // Vdha_3,346.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:538: balormimān sādhvaradīnasattvaḥ samṛddhimān duṣprasahas tvam eva /
GP12vd3343pu:539: tapaḥ śrutaṃ sarvam ahīnakīrtir anāgatādīn viṣayāṃś ca vetsi // Vdha_3,346.30 //
GP12vd3343pu:540: tvam uttamaḥ sarvam idaṃ carācaraṃ gabhastibhir bhānur ivāvabhāse /
GP12vd3343pu:541: samākṣipan bhānusutaprabhāṃ muhus tvam antakaḥ sarvam idaṃ dhruvādhruva (?) // Vdha_3,346.31 //
GP12vd3343pu:542: divākaraḥ parikramati yathā dahan prajās tathā dahasi hutāśanaprabha /
GP12vd3343pu:543: bhayaṃkaraḥ pralaya ivāgnir utthito vināśayaty uragaparivartapāntakṛt (?) // Vdha_3,346.32 //
GP12vd3343pu:544: khageśvaraṃ śaraṇam upāgato 'smy ahaṃ mahaujasaṃ vitimirabhragocaram (?) /
GP12vd3343pu:545: mahābalaṃ garuḍam upetya khecaraṃ mahaujasaṃ varadam ajeyam aklamam // Vdha_3,346.33 //
GP12vd3343pu:546: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde garuḍastotraṃ nāma
GP12vd3343pu:549: stutas tu garuḍo rājñā pṛṣṭhamāro 'py apārthivam /
GP12vd3343pu:550: darśayām āsa devasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ // Vdha_3,347.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:552: tuṣṭāva bhaktyā rājendra deveśam aparājitam // Vdha_3,347.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:558: na te viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:559: ādis tvaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca jagadguro // Vdha_3,347.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:560: sūkṣmas tvaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo mahadbhyaś ca mahattaraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:561: dūragas tvaṃ mahābhāga sarveṣām api cāgataḥ // Vdha_3,347.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:564: puruṣas tvaṃ tvam avyaktas tvam ātmā buddhir eva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:565: mahābhūtāni bhagavas tvaṃ tathaivendriyāṇi ca // Vdha_3,347.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:567: ye tvāṃ bhajanti te yānti bhagavan paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,347.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:568: jayam anagham ajeyaṃ viśvagaṃ devadevaṃ tridaśaripuvināśe nityam udyuktaśaktim /
GP12vd3343pu:569: dvijasuravaravandyaṃ nāśanaṃ kalmaṣāṇāṃ śaraṇam upagato 'haṃ vāsudevaṃ śaraṇyam // Vdha_3,347.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:570: // iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde vāsudevastotraṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 347 //
GP12vd3343pu:573: uvāca prāñjaliṃ prahvaṃ pārthivaṃ purataḥ sthitam // Vdha_3,348.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:575: nānṛtaṃ nṛpa vaktavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagair api /
GP12vd3343pu:576: dharmapraśno na vaktavyas tathaikena viśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,348.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:578: durvijñeyās tathā dharmāḥ sūkṣmā rājan duranvayāḥ // Vdha_3,348.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:579: tasmān naikena vaktavyāḥ kadācid api jānatā /
GP12vd3343pu:580: uktvānṛtaṃ mahat prāptaṃ tvayā kṛcchraṃ narādhipa // Vdha_3,348.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:582: mama bhakto 'si satataṃ tena te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // Vdha_3,348.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:583: kālenālpena kalpena yā na śakyā surāsuraiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:584: gaccha pālaya rājyaṃ tvaṃ tathaivāvicalo bhava // Vdha_3,348.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:586: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ vijñeyaṃ daivataṃ param // Vdha_3,348.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:588: evam uktvā vasuṃ viṣṇus tatraivādarśanaṃ gataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:589: tārkṣyeṇa sahito rājan vismitaś cābhavad vasuḥ // Vdha_3,348.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:590: rājyaṃ cāvāpa bhūyo 'pi khecaratvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:591: tataḥ sabhājitaś cāpi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // Vdha_3,348.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:592: evaṃ sa devena hi bhaktiyukto rasātalastho vasudhādhipeśaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:593: bhayāt sughorāt pravimucya yukto rājyena gatvā nabhasas tathaiva // Vdha_3,348.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:594: // iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde vasūpākhyānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 348 //
GP12vd3343pu:600: viśvarūpāṇi devasya yāny aśakyāni bhāṣitum // Vdha_3,349.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:602: viśvarūpadharaṃ draṣṭuṃ tāvac chaktir na vidyate // Vdha_3,349.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:603: tatra yad darśitaṃ caiva nāradasya purānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:604: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi viśvadevena viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,349.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:608: hariḥ kṛṣṇo naraś caiva tathā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Vdha_3,349.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:609: hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthit[au] vṛtte tadā lokāntare kila /
GP12vd3343pu:610: naranārāyaṇau devau tapasy ugre tathā ratau // Vdha_3,349.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:613: dadarśa nāradas tatra tāv ubhau dīptatejasau /
GP12vd3343pu:614: abhivādya gatau devau tayos tu purataḥ sthitaḥ // Vdha_3,349.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:618: dadarśa vighnaṃ kurvāṇau devakarma tathānaghau // Vdha_3,349.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:619: tataḥ kṛtāhnik[au] prāha nāradas tau jagadgurū /
GP12vd3343pu:620: bhavantau jagatāṃ nāthau bhavantau parameśvarau // Vdha_3,349.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:622: bhavadbhyām arcyate kaś ca daive pitrye ca kalpyate // Vdha_3,349.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:623: prakṛtir yā parāsmākaṃ yataḥ sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:625: pūjayāmaḥ sadā brahman daive pitrye ca kalpite /
GP12vd3343pu:626: viprān devagurūn gāś ca pitṝṃś caiva jagattraye // Vdha_3,349.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:627: ye 'rcayanty arcayanty eva taṃ devaṃ parameśvaram /
GP12vd3343pu:628: yo 'yam apy arcayed devaṃ tena syāt pūjito hariḥ // Vdha_3,349.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:629: vidhihīnaṃ mahābhāga sa hi sarvagato yataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:630: devasyānyasya yac cārcāṃ kartukāmo 'rcayed dharim // Vdha_3,349.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:631: tena tasya kṛtārcā syād dvijaśreṣṭha vidhānataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:632: deve yasmāt surāḥ sarvaṃ trailokyam api yad gatam // Vdha_3,349.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:634: nāsti lokeṣu tad brahma yatra nāsti janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,349.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:635: na tad apy asti lokeṣu yan na viṣṇau pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vd3343pu:636: yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ // Vdha_3,349.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:637: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:640: upetāś ca tathā sarve cakrava[r]tyupalakṣaṇaiḥ // Vdha_3,349.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:644: taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate nityaṃ taiś ca saṃpūjyate sadā // Vdha_3,349.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:646: akāmāś ca jagannātham arcayanti sadā ca ye // Vdha_3,349.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:647: te yānti deham utsṛjya tad dvīpaṃ śvetasaṃjñitam /
GP12vd3343pu:650: pūjayanti hariṃ tatra divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:652: brahmaṃs tapobhiḥ pradyumnaṃ tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ prabhum // Vdha_3,349.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:653: vāsudevaṃ tataḥ prāpya tenaiva sadṛśās tataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:654: bhavanti sarve sarvatra sarvadā sarvaśaktayaḥ // Vdha_3,349.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:655: muktāś ca sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ paraṃ sukham upāgatāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:656: sa tvaṃ śīghram ito gatvā śvetadvīpanivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,349.30 //
GP12vd3343pu:657: paśya tvaṃ puruṣān brahman prasannaḥ sa vibhus tava /
GP12vd3343pu:658: darśayiṣyati rūpaṃ tu trailokyādbhutam adbhutam // Vdha_3,349.31 //
GP12vd3343pu:660: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva mahātapāḥ // Vdha_3,349.32 //
GP12vd3343pu:661: taṃ tu deśaṃ gatā brahman na tair dṛṣṭo janārdanaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:665: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana /
GP12vd3343pu:666: namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja // Vdha_3,349.35 //
GP12vd3343pu:667: ślokam etaṃ tu te śrutvā śrutavantas tathā giram /
GP12vd3343pu:670: śvetadvīpe gatir nāsti vinā caikāntibhir dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.37 //
GP12vd3343pu:672: tapasogreṇa saṃyuktās tena me deśam āgatāḥ // Vdha_3,349.38 //
GP12vd3343pu:673: sāmānyabhaktisattvāś ca punar vrajata mā ciram /
GP12vd3343pu:675: ebhiḥ ślokais tathā dṛṣṭo bhavatīti janārdanaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:676: ekāntabhāvanāsaktaiḥ ślokais tu puruṣair imam // Vdha_3,349.40 //
GP12vd3343pu:677: japtavyaṃ satataṃ viprās tataḥ punar ih[ai]ṣyatha /
GP12vd3343pu:681: ślokam etaṃ paṭhed viprā namaskāre pradakṣiṇe /
GP12vd3343pu:682: snānam etena kartavyaṃ tathā cānte jalaṃ dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.43 //
GP12vd3343pu:684: śloka eṣa vinirdiṣṭaḥ sarvakāmapradaḥ śivaḥ // Vdha_3,349.44 //
GP12vd3343pu:685: āpatprāptena japtavyaṃ tan mokṣārthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:686: etasya jāpaḥ kartavyo nityam eva vijānatā // Vdha_3,349.45 //
GP12vd3343pu:687: etasya jāpāt puruṣaḥ sarvān kāmān upāśnute /
GP12vd3343pu:688: etāṃ śrutvā tu te vāṇīṃ cāgatā magadhāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.46 //
GP12vd3343pu:690: yājako yasya dharmātmā devācāryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.47 //
GP12vd3343pu:691: adṛśyena hṛto bhāgas tatra devena viṣṇunā /
GP12vd3343pu:692: jagṛhur devatāḥ sarvā dṛśyabhāgāt purodhasaḥ // Vdha_3,349.48 //
GP12vd3343pu:694: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caivam avocatam // Vdha_3,349.49 //
GP12vd3343pu:695: adṛśyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ taṃ kathaṃ draṣṭum icchasi /
GP12vd3343pu:696: ity evam anunītas tu devācryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.50 //
GP12vd3343pu:697: samāpayām āsa tadā taṃ yajñaṃ pārthivasya ca /
GP12vd3343pu:701: tasmāt taṃ devadeveśaṃ tatrasthaṃ paśya nārada /
GP12vd3343pu:702: tvayāpi devakāryāṇi kartavyāni bahūny atha // Vdha_3,349.53 //
GP12vd3343pu:705: kalpāvasāne tu gatiṃ tāṃ tvaṃ vipra gamiṣyasi // Vdha_3,349.54 //
GP12vd3343pu:708: abhivādyātha tau devau taṃ dvīpaṃ nārado gataḥ // Vdha_3,349.55 //
GP12vd3343pu:710: pūjayām āsa śirasā tāṃś ca bhaktyā sa nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,349.56 //
GP12vd3343pu:712: dadarśa tān eva narāñ śvetā[ṃś] candraprabhāñ śubhān // Vdha_3,349.57 //
GP12vd3343pu:713: pūjayām āsa śirasā manasā tais tu pūjitaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:716: stotraṃ jagau sa viśvāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane // Vdha_3,349.59 //
GP12vd3343pu:721: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīye khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde śrīnāradasya śvetadvīpagamanavarṇano (/
GP12vd3343pu:903: bhakto 'haṃ tvāṃ didṛkṣur ekāntadarśanāyety oṃ namaḥ / Vdha_3,350.[179] /
GP12vd3343pu:904: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde śvetadvīpe śrīnāradastotravarṇano nāma pañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GP12vd3343pu:906: sa dadarśa tadā viṣṇuṃ viśvarūpadharaṃ harim /
GP12vd3343pu:915: anirdeśyāni varṇāni tathā bibhrat kvacit kvacit // Vdha_3,351.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:919: grahāṇām atha ṛkṣāṇāṃ rudrāṇāṃ vasubhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:920: ādityānāṃ samarutāṃ bhṛgūṇāṃ ca tathā dvija /
GP12vd3343pu:921: tathaivāṅgiraso rājan sādhyānām aśvibhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:926: kānicit tasya saumyāni kānicid bhīṣaṇāni ca /
GP12vd3343pu:927: dadarśa tasya vaktrāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:929: dadarśa sarvataś cāgnīn grasyamānāṃś ca viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,351.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:930: saumyebhyas tasya vaktrebhyo nirgacchantyas tathā prajāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:931: vāhāṃś ca vividhāṃs tasya sa dadarśātha nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,351.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:933: yuktān nānāvidhair bhāṇḍair āyudhaiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.14 //
GP12vd3343pu:935: kecic ca kalaśaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ śaṅkhapadmotpalādibhiḥ // Vdha_3,351.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:939: bījapūrṇākṣamālāś ca pūrṇapātrais tathā paraiḥ // Vdha_3,351.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:940: evaṃ nānāvidhair bhāṇḍaiḥ karāṃs tasya samanvitān /
GP12vd3343pu:943: śirāṃsi dṛṣṭayo hastāṃs tasya devasya dṛṣṭavān // Vdha_3,351.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:944: trailokyaṃ ca T kāye sakalaṃ munisattamaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:947: jagat samagraṃ devasya dehasthaṃ dṛṣṭavān muniḥ // Vdha_3,351.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:948: sa dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ rūpaṃ bhīto hṛṣṭaś ca vismitaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:949: papāta pādayos tasya śirasā sāśrulocanaḥ // Vdha_3,351.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:951: tam uvāca tato devaḥ prahasann ṛṣisattamam // Vdha_3,351.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:953: uttiṣṭha mā bhair dharmajña varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam /
GP12vd3343pu:955: nityam ekāntike deva bhaktir bhavatu sā tvayi /
GP12vd3343pu:956: nānyaṃ varaṃ kāmayāmi narāṇām idam uttamam // Vdha_3,351.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:958: tam uvāca tato devaḥ praṇatārtiharo hariḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:959: etan nisargasiddhaṃ te yena tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān mama // Vdha_3,351.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:960: viśvarūpam idaṃ brahmann avajñeyaṃ tathā tvayā /
GP12vd3343pu:961: tapas taptaṃ yato vipra mamāpi ca tatas tava // Vdha_3,351.26 //
GP12vd3343pu:962: rūpam etat samāsthāya rūpaṃ svaṃ dvija darśitam /
GP12vd3343pu:963: icchārūpāṇy ahaṃ kuryāṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:965: mamaiva tāni jānīha matto 'nyan nāsti kiṃcana // Vdha_3,351.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:966: ahaṃ bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca vartamānam ahaṃ tathā /
GP12vd3343pu:967: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvam evāsmi nārada // Vdha_3,351.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:968: sac cāsac cāham evātra tattvam etad bravīmi te /
GP12vd3343pu:971: yaḥ kariṣyati me stotraṃ stotreṇa tvatkṛtena tu // Vdha_3,351.31 //
GP12vd3343pu:972: tasya kāmān vidhāsyāmi ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:973: śvetadvīpe gatis tasya mṛtasya ca bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,351.32 //
GP12vd3343pu:976: vārāhe tu gate kalpe tato mātsyo bhaviṣyati /
GP12vd3343pu:977: devakāryāṇi kāryāṇi subahūni yatas tvayā // Vdha_3,351.34 //
GP12vd3343pu:979: prādurbhāvāṇi me brahman vyatītāni sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.35 //
GP12vd3343pu:980: bhaviṣyanti tathānyāni tatra me śṛṇu kānicit /
GP12vd3343pu:983: ahaṃ matsyas tathā kūrmo haṃso 'ham api nārada // Vdha_3,351.37 //
GP12vd3343pu:985: mayāśvaśirasā vedā dānavebhyas tathā hṛtāḥ // Vdha_3,351.38 //
GP12vd3343pu:987: vārāheṇa mayā daityāḥ pātālatalagā hatāḥ // Vdha_3,351.39 //
GP12vd3343pu:989: dānavāś ca hatā yuddhe naranārāyaṇātmanā // Vdha_3,351.40 //
GP12vd3343pu:990: lokottare tathā mārge hariḥ kṛṣṇas tathāpy aham /
GP12vd3343pu:992: vāmanena mayā bhūtvā bales tribhuvanaṃ hṛtam /
GP12vd3343pu:993: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ purā brahman devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // Vdha_3,351.42 //
GP12vd3343pu:995: pṛthvī vasumatī brahman pṛthunā ca mayā kṛtā // Vdha_3,351.43 //
GP12vd3343pu:997: dattātreyeṇa vasudhā devā dvija.gaṇāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,351.44 //
GP12vd3343pu:1000: dattvā caturdhā putrāṃś ca mayā daśarathasya ca /
GP12vd3343pu:1003: meghanādavadhaḥ kāryo lakṣmaṇena tathā mayā // Vdha_3,351.47 //
GP12vd3343pu:1004: śatrughnena ca kartavyo lavaṇasya vadhas tathā /
GP12vd3343pu:1005: mayā vālmīkinā kāryaṃ kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ tathā // Vdha_3,351.48 //
GP12vd3343pu:1006: vyāsena vedā vaktavyā ākhyānaṃ bhārataṃ mahat /
GP12vd3343pu:1008: pāṇḍoḥ putratvam āsādya pañcadhā ca tathā mayā /
GP12vd3343pu:1009: dvidhā ca vasudevasya laghvī kāryā vasuṃdharā // Vdha_3,351.50 //
GP12vd3343pu:1011: balabhadreṇa ca mayā hantavyā mauṣṭikādayaḥ // Vdha_3,351.51 //
GP12vd3343pu:1013: pradyumnena nihantavyaḥ śambaraś ca mahābalaḥ // Vdha_3,351.52 //
GP12vd3343pu:1015: sāmbena yuyudhānena mayā bhūtvā tathaiva ca // Vdha_3,351.53 //
GP12vd3343pu:1016: mayā buddhena vaktavyā dharmāḥ kaliyuge punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1019: ṛṣayaś ca tathā jñeyā mamaivāṃśasamudbhavāḥ // Vdha_3,351.55 //
GP12vd3343pu:1020: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmadūrjitam eva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:1021: tat tad evāvagacches tvaṃ mama tejo'ṃśasaṃbhavam // Vdha_3,351.56 //
GP12vd3343pu:1022: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñānena tavānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:1023: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśenāsthito jagat // Vdha_3,351.57 //
GP12vd3343pu:1024: tad gaccha mānasī siddhiḥ sadā te 'stu dvijottama /
GP12vd3343pu:1027: bhagavān nāradaś cakre pujāṃ taddeśavāsinām // Vdha_3,351.59 //
GP12vd3343pu:1028: taiś ca saṃpūjito vipras tān praṇamya yatavrataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1030: pādayor nyapatat tatra sa tayor munipūjyayoḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1031: tābhyāṃ saṃpūjito vipras tatrovāsa tadāśrame // Vdha_3,351.61 //
GP12vd3343pu:1032: tataḥ kadācit taṃ vipram ūcatus tau tapodhanau /
GP12vd3343pu:1033: āvābhyāṃ tvaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaḥ śvetadvīpagate 'cyutaḥ // Vdha_3,351.62 //
GP12vd3343pu:1035: loke 'smin muniśārdūla nāsti dhanyataras tvayā // Vdha_3,351.63 //
GP12vd3343pu:1036: dṛṣṭavān asi yad brahman viśvarūpadharaṃ harim /
GP12vd3343pu:1038: yatas te 'nugrahas tena kṛto devena viṣṇunā /
GP12vd3343pu:1039: tato guhyaṃ nibodhemaṃ tatpūjāvidhim uttamam // Vdha_3,351.65 //
GP12vd3343pu:1041: nābhaktāya ca tad deyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇasattama // Vdha_3,351.66 //
GP12vd3343pu:1042: ekāntabhāvopagataṃ janārdanaṃ naras tu saṃpūjya tathā vidhānataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1043: prayāti taddvīpam anuttamaṃ śivaṃ na yatra gatvā vinivartate punaḥ // Vdha_3,351.67 //
GP12vd3343pu:1047: ādāv eva saraḥsaritprasravaṇasamīpagṛhopavanaparvatamastakānām anyatame hṛdye deśe susamaṃ
GP12vd3343pu:1051: tataḥ padmakarṇikāmadhye śvetaṃ śatapatraṃ padmaṃ dhyāyet // [Vdha_3,352.0.3] //
GP12vd3343pu:1055: tanmadhye paraṃ puruṣam aśarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśam aśabdaṃ sarvagaṃ plutāntaṃ oṃkāraṃ vinyaset // [Vdha_3,352.0.4] //
GP12vd3343pu:1064: aiśāne dale tad iti brahmāṇaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1069: prapūrvadvāre oṃ keṃ ṭeṃ yeṃ etāny akṣarāṇi vainateyaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1076: sveṃ ṭheṃ heṃ theṃ uttare dvāre aniruddhaṃ nyasyet /
GP12vd3343pu:1078: veṃ ṇeṃ kṣeṃ kṣeṃ vidikṣu pāñcajanyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1080: dheṃ heṃ bheṃ heṃ śriyaṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1082: geṃ ḍeṃ veṃ śeṃ padmāntarataḥ puṣṭiṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1092: oṃ cheṃ ṭheṃ vāyavye kaustubhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:1097: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāyety antena dvādaśākṣareṇa karṇikāmadhye puruṣāyārghyapādyācamanīyānulepanapuṣpadīpadhūpamadhuparkanaivedyaphalabhakṣyāṇi
GP12vd3343pu:1100: oṃ jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana /
GP12vd3343pu:1103: athānyān dalaniviṣṭān devān yathābhihitair mantraiḥ pṛthakpṛthag arcaye[t] // [Vdha_3,352.0.27] //
GP12vd3343pu:1104: anena vidhinā yas tu viṣṇum abhyarcayen naraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1105: sarvān saṃsādhayed arthān kṛtakṛtyo hi jāyate // Vdha_3,352.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:1106: kṛtvā vyādhiṃ vyā[dh]itaṃ bhakṣayati na karoti na tad āpnoti idaṃ tv anyat /
GP12vd3343pu:1109: ārogyaṃ dhanadhānyavardhanaṃ śatrughnaṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ yaḥ puruṣo 'nena vidhinā satataṃ devam
GP12vd3343pu:1110: abhyarcayati saṃpattiṃ janayati athavā tasya na rocate tadā śvetadvīpam avpyāpya arkamaṇḍalaṃ bhittvā
GP12vd3343pu:1111: niruṇaddhi pradyumnasaṃkarṣaṇān prāpnoti sudevatvam avāpya niṣkalatvam āpnoti // [Vdha_3,352.2.2] //
GP12vd3343pu:1118: tataḥ puṃsavano bhagavān nāradasya mahātmanaḥ // Vdha_3,353.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:1119: pratyakṣataḥ punar bhūtaṃ nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GP12vd3343pu:1120: gaccha nārada bhadra tvaṃ lokāṃś cara yathepsitān // Vdha_3,353.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:1122: anugraham idaṃ prāpya deveśāt puruṣottamāt // Vdha_3,353.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:1123: cacāra nārado lokān nityaṃ saṃpūjayan harim /
GP12vd3343pu:1124: viśvarūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nāradena mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:1126: tathā cāmṛtakādehe tenaiva ca mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:1127: brahmaṇā ca purā dṛṣṭaṃ t[r]ailokyākramaṇe punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1128: paścime sāgare dṛṣṭaṃ daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā // Vdha_3,353.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:1133: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe gacchanto dvārakāṃ punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1134: mārgāgatena tad dṛṣṭam uttaṅkena mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:1136: tasya karṃāṇi yo nityaṃ puruṣaḥ parikīrtayet // Vdha_3,353.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:1138: sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,353.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:1139: evaṃ sa rājan dvijavaryamukhyaḥ saṃprāptavān devavarāt prasādam /
GP12vd3343pu:1140: bhaktikramakraiyanṛpaprasādāt tasmād dhi kāmān puruṣā labhante // Vdha_3,353.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:1141: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde nāradaprasādo nāma
